msg.msgText:
The values of configuration items of the "LTPAProfile" composite object can be viewed by using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show LTPAProfile help imaserver show LTPAProfile "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver show LTPAProfile "Name=LtpaProfile"
The following configuration items are returned:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
